name: Flipper Quest
description:
Made in 2 days for the Kenney Game Jam.
Really Small Platforming Game.

You control a ball that rotate itself in order to move.

Left/Right: Left Arrow/Right Arrow & A/D

Left Click: Interact with objects.

Music By Impact:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDuWBT_2WPB1j7rIpYohAkQ
